member.name: T:Hex.Ajax.BeginLinkExtensions
member.summary: Represents support for ASP.NET AJAX links within an ASP.NET MVC application with an expression for specifying HTML attributes.

member.name: M:Hex.Ajax.BeginLinkExtensions.BeginActionLink(System.Web.Mvc.AjaxHelper,System.String,System.Web.Mvc.Ajax.AjaxOptions)
member.summary: Writes an opening <a> tag to the response that contains the URL to the specified action method; when the action link is clicked, the action method is invoked asynchronously by using JavaScript.
member.param: The AJAX helper.
The name of the action method.
An object that provides options for the asynchronous request.

member.name: M:Hex.Ajax.BeginLinkExtensions.BeginActionLink(System.Web.Mvc.AjaxHelper,System.String,System.Web.Mvc.Ajax.AjaxOptions,System.Action{Hex.AttributeBuilders.HtmlAttributeBuilder})
member.summary: Writes an opening <a> tag to the response that contains the URL to the specified action method; when the action link is clicked, the action method is invoked asynchronously by using JavaScript.
member.param: The AJAX helper.
The name of the action method.
An object that provides options for the asynchronous request.
An expression that contains the HTML attributes to set for the element.

member.name: M:Hex.Ajax.BeginLinkExtensions.BeginActionLink(System.Web.Mvc.AjaxHelper,System.String,System.Object,System.Web.Mvc.Ajax.AjaxOptions)
member.summary: Writes an opening <a> tag to the response that contains the URL to the specified action method; when the action link is clicked, the action method is invoked asynchronously by using JavaScript.
member.param: The AJAX helper.
The name of the action method.

An object that contains the parameters for a route. The parameters are retrieved through reflection by examining the properties of the object. The object is typically created by using object initializer syntax.
An object that provides options for the asynchronous request.
